OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params._receiver: The address of the fee receiver
params._tokenDown: The address of the TDN token
params._tokenUp: The address of the TUP token

returns._0: marketAddress The address of the created market

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to rate

returns._0: price The price of the rating

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to recover

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._receiver: The address of the fee receiver

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

MIN_RATING_AMOUNT.details: The minimum amount of tokens that can be rated

VERSION.details: This contract is immutable and non-upgradeable. Further versions of this contract will be deployed independently.

marketToUrl.details: Mapping of active markets to their URLs

ratingPrice.details: The price of a rating in ether

urlToMarket.details: Mapping of URLs to their markets

createDownRating((string,uint256)).notice: Creates a down rating for a single market

createMarket(string).notice: Creates a new market for a URL

createUpRating((string,uint256)).notice: Creates an up rating for a single market

getMarketAddress(string).notice: Gets the market address for a URL

getUserRatings(address).notice: Returns the total number of immutables ratings (IRs) for a user

previewPayment(uint256).notice: Preview the payment for a rating

recoverERC20(address,address).notice: Recovers ERC20 tokens from the contract

userdoc.notice: Core controller contract for the Immutable Ratings platform
